mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_STORE_REPLY(STORE_REPLY_NUMBER, STORE_REPLY_CONTENT, STORE_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, STORE_SCORE) VALUES (SEQ_STORE_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{storeReplyContent}, #{storeNumber}, #{userNumber}, #{storeScore})
mapper.select: SELECT STORE_REPLY_NUMBER, STORE_REPLY_CONTENT, STORE_REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, STORE_REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, STORE_NUMBER, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NICKNAME, STORE_SCORE FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_STORE_REPLY R ON U.USER_NUMBER = R.USER_NUMBER WHERE STORE_NUMBER = #{storeNumber} ORDER BY STORE_REPLY_NUMBER DESC

SELECT STORE_REPLY_NUMBER, STORE_REPLY_CONTENT, STORE_REPLY_REGISTER_DATE, STORE_REPLY_UPDATE_DATE, STORE_NUMBER, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_STORE_REPLY R ON STORE_REPLY_NUMBER = #{storeReplyNumber} AND R.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER
